metadata.job_location: Las Condes, Santiago Metropolitan Region, Chile

seniority_level.evidence: 5+ years of experience required and responsibilities include mentoring and reviewing junior engineers, indicating senior‑level expectations despite the title lacking a senior qualifier.

job_family.evidence: Job title is "Data Engineer" and core duties revolve around building and maintaining data pipelines.

sub_specialty.evidence: Description emphasizes building moderate‑complexity data pipelines, data cleaning, and modeling without mention of real‑time streaming technologies.

leadership_expectation.evidence: Candidate is expected to provide mentorship and code reviews for junior engineers but no direct‑report or people‑management duties are listed.

primary_cloud.evidence: Pass 1 hard skills list includes "Google Cloud Platform" and the posting repeatedly references GCP knowledge.

secondary_clouds.evidence: No other cloud providers are mentioned in the posting or Pass 1 extraction.

processing_paradigm.evidence: Pipelines are described as moderate‑complexity batch ETL processes; no streaming frameworks (e.g., Kafka, Flink) are referenced.

orchestrator_category.evidence: The posting does not name any workflow/orchestration tool such as Airflow, Composer, or Dagster.

storage_layer.evidence: No specific data warehouse (e.g., BigQuery) or lake (e.g., Cloud Storage) technologies are called out.

remote_restriction.evidence: Location restriction is "Las Condes, Santiago Metropolitan Region, Chile" and work model is listed as onsite.

timezone_focus.evidence: The role is based in Chile, which falls in the Americas time zones.

relocation_required.evidence: No relocation assistance or requirement is mentioned; the job is onsite in a specific Chilean city.

h1b_friendly.evidence: Pass 1 extraction marks visa sponsorship as "not_mentioned".

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No language indicating acceptance of OPT/CPT visas is present.

citizenship_required.evidence: Neither citizenship nor specific work‑authorization requirements are stated beyond the Chile location restriction.

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Employment type is not specified; no contract language (W2, C2C, 1099) appears in the posting.

benefits_level.evidence: Pass 1 extraction shows an empty benefits list and no equity, PTO, or other perks are described.

growth_path_clarity.evidence: The posting does not discuss career ladders, promotion tracks, or growth opportunities.

mentorship_signals.evidence: Soft skill requirement includes "Mentoring" and the description states the candidate will provide mentorship to junior data engineers.

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No language about promotions, titles, or advancement paths is present.

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: The posting does not reference internal transfers or mobility programs.

career_tracks_available.evidence: No mention of IC, management, specialist, or architect tracks.

requirement_strictness.evidence: Must‑have list includes many technical skills, 5+ years experience, cloud certification, and English proficiency; only two nice‑to‑have items are listed.

scope_definition.evidence: Job description focuses specifically on data engineering tasks without blending other roles.

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: The required skill set aligns with a senior‑level data engineer; no unrealistic junior‑senior mismatch is observed.
